description: The top 10 Democrats will face off on a single stage for the first time. Two candidates with clashing ideologies — Joseph R. Biden and Elizabeth Warren — will be at the center of it all.
title: Third Democratic Debate: The Top 10 on One Stage
title_page: Third Democratic Debate: The Top 10 on One Stage - The New York Times
maintext:
Has emphasized her Midwestern background and taken a moderate tack on issues like health care and student debt.
From the July debate: “Yes, I have bold ideas, but they are grounded in reality. And, yes, I will make some simple promises. I can win this. I’m from the Midwest.”
National polling average: <1%
